Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

::Whistler::
       "Hmph.  How quickly we forget.  Yes, my name is Whistler.  We met once 
before.  You were under attack and I tried to help.  I got blasted over the 
base and left there to recover on my own.  I had a lot of time to think."

--part1_a7.1245df65.28ab28d2_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

<HTML><FONT FACE=arial,helvetica><FONT  SIZE=2>::Whistler::
<BR>       "Hmph.  How quickly we forget.  Yes, my name is Whistler.  We met once 
<BR>before.  You were under attack and I tried to help.  I got blasted over the 
<BR>base and left there to recover on my own.  I had a lot of time to think."</FONT></HTML>

--part1_a7.1245df65.28ab28d2_boundary--
